say_hello[source]

say_hello(to:str)

Say hello to to

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello("Mike")

'Hello Mike!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Diana") == "Hello Diana!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
greeting = HelloSayer("Alexis")
greeting.say()

'Hello Alexis!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from nbdev.export import notebook2script; notebook2script()
{% endraw %}
